document_data.name: Ali Haqim
document_data.mainbody: '''Ali Haqim''' was a masterful [[Zakharan (ethnicity)|Zakharan]] [[elephant]]-rider who lived in [[Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|139|[[Ali Haqim]]}}
document_data.Activites: Ali began his career as a regular [[mamluk]], but his master quickly discovered his talent for training elephants. Ali was soon given command of a formation of a hundred elephants. Ali went on to train elephants for many princes of Zakhara.
document_data.Possessions: Ali wielded a [[scimitar]] and wore [[padded armor]].
